promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a young simple fox electric-type wearing regal armor. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltwood, a young simple fox electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: ion-deluge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word fox or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, fox-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: Voltwood lives in cities and sparks energy with its electrostatic fur. It plays and runs around, radiating its unique aura.
